TextLibrary.Text: A huge blizzard is blocking the way through the path, as is one of Lord Bane's Doomknights.
You have failed to defeat the Doomknight. You must try again.
The blizzard is too strong - you cannot cross the mountains.
You have defeated the Doomknight, but a huge blizzard is blocking the pass.
You have tried to cross Gornak's Gap and failed. There must be another way through.
You must cross the mountains through Gornak's Gap and travel to Lord Bane's citadel.
You must defeat one of Lord Bane's minions - a Doomknight - to try and cross the pass.
Gornak's Gap is blocked by a huge blizzard. You must travel back to Tauron in Ohtar.
